# rocket

`rocket` is a Python library for ..........

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install `rocket`.

```bash
pip install rocket
```

## Usage

```python
import rocket

# returns 'words'
rocket.module_name('word')

# returns 'geese'
rocket.module_name('goose')

# returns 'phenomenon'
rocket.module_name('phenomena')
```
